author: Anonymous Atom
title: iClicker Issues
question:
There were a few technical issues with iClicker during the first iClicker quiz during the lecture today. I was wondering if the quizzes during this week would count towards the overall 15% grade from lecture quizzes?
Some of us couldn't see the question, or had errors when trying to send our answer to the iClicker server, etc.
student_answer: The professor said the first week of iClicker quizzes wouldn't count towards our grade
